author: EXM7777
text:
i posted here every single day for 6 months, here's what happened:

- made $10k in creator revenue
- went from 0 to 40k followers
- grew a telegram up to 8k members
- grew a newsletter up to 6k subs

all from relentlessly stacking value and cutting through the noise to give you the best AI business applications

shoutout to everyone who joined this ride... we're just getting started, the best is still to come

ask me anything about twitter growth
